title: Reborn into a Hamster for 233 Days - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Animal Characteristics   Arrogant Characters   Black Belly   Business Management   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Near-Death Experience   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secrets   Slow Romance   Time Travel   Transformation Ability   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters
author: Yi Shu   异数
description:
The renowned SI Corporation’s chief designer, Xiao Yu, is young, promising, and brimming with talent. But who would have guessed that the heavens would be jealous of this heroic genius?! After waking up from a car accident, he unexpectedly is reborn as a hamster!

Never mind that he’d turned into a hamster, but the CEO rival he hated the most in his previous life adopted him!

Hamster Xiao declared: Hnn, I’m gonna screw up your company!

Chairman Yan: The weather is turning cold, it’s time to buy small clothes for the hamster and bankrupt SI along the way.>
